channel.title: [REQ] Construction Skill [REQ]
channel.description:
Hey,
I would just like to know if adding construction to your server is impossible? Like everyone has their own house etc. If you know of a TUT please post :D Please Comment.
Thanks

item.title: [REQ] Construction Skill [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

You could just create a 474+ server. They have the constuction skill and you could build on from that.

And to answer your question, no it is not impossible to add construction, a few servers have them (Full construction) but they havnâ€™t been released so I doubt there would be a tutorial on how to add them lol.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Construction Skill [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

in 317s, its unheard of, but not impossible.

the sheer effort needed in emulating the actual skill is hard, not to mention the huge amount of models and objects you would have to load, along with interfaces etc

so for now, if you want to get construction, youll have to DIY

Read full topic
